title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in a data/text item.
EB: Expected Behavior: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format for both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Input new Date() as content for three items.
2. Save and preview.

Observed Behavior:
- The data and text item display the datetime in the same format.
- The dynamic text item displays the datetime in a different format than the data and text item.
